attributes.action: Standardise the training and use of volunteer community first responders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take note of the HCC report on Community first Responders (15/12/07) and set national standards for all NHS Ambulance Service Trusts in using these voluteers in order to have a common approach to training, categories of response, communication and deployment and whether or not warning lights and sirens should be a standard for these '999' support services.
